name: outdoorsmanship
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
enjoyment of the outdoors, or an ability or interest in activities that are done outdoors, for example fishing and hunting: My father introduced us to the world of outdoorsmanship when we were still very young. The royal family has a long history of hunting and outdoorsmanship. Synonym
outdoorspersonshipRelated words
outdoorsman
outdoorswomanship
More examplesFewer examplesThey were trained in survival techniques and outdoorsmanship.As a child I was afraid of the water and outdoorsmanship made me sick.The story combines elements of suspense, romance and outdoorsmanship.
